title: 'Product review'
body: The quantity of product is good it's effect on skin and after bath freshness is good. It's value of money

title: 'SHORT ITEM QTY IN BOX'
body: 'When I needed it I opened this box and found only 4 pieces in it.'

title: 'using medimix from child hood'
body: i'm using the medimix soap from my childhood days it's one of my lovable brands which takes care for the skin no skin problems will come near to you if you use it daily for your bathing or cleaning face other outer skin related purposes like washing hands and legs also no skin problems will come near to you after it's soap usuage

title: 'Not real medimix'
body: Starting smell of soap is good but afterwards it looses its smell.It doesn't have foam. Its value for money but not recommended.

title: 'Good'
body: 'The product received is genuine and the expiration dates are current.'

title: 'Good soap'
body: 'Does the job... Will like it more if the price is in discount.'

title: 'Fake product'
body: 'This is not authentic medimix soap. Should have paid more attention to how the label was printed before buying.. Make sure you are buying the real one...'

title: 'Worst service ever'
body: 'Soap box is already opened. And 3rd class quality product.'

title: 'Aroma'
body: It's very nice and children also likes it's aroma/smell... We loved it and ordering again...

title: 'Disappointed'
body: They changed everything that was good about the soap. Now it's a stone with bad smell. Total disappointment. Please bring back the original version.

title: 'good'
body: 'maine pehle bhi isko use kiya tha isliye firse order kiya hai and i love this product price thoda sa jada hai but its ok'

title: This soap is not like before....it's so oilyyy
body: 'It makes the skin look dull n so oily....I hv used medimix for years.....but not the quality is the worst'

title: 'Fabulous ü§©'
body: 'Good product Amazon providing in less price then other market places'

title: 'Its not genuine products like fake products'
'New Curved edges of soap are slippery.'
body: We have been using Medimix soap since ages that I don't even remember. The soap is absolutely amazing. But this new form of soap which have curved edges are not good to handle. They are slipping from hands while holding wet. Which is very difficult to pick up every other minute to apply on body parts. So I request to maintain the original rectangular shape. Thank you.

title: 'Hyped up product. Feels the same as any ordinary soap.'
'Mast Ekdum'
body: 'this soap is high quality and the scents are amazing.'

title: 'Very good'
body: 'Just as classic as it was a few years ago...'

title: 'VERY GOOD FOR SKIN'
body: 'This product is very good. My family has been using it since a long time. Good for those who have skin problems like itchiness rashes(although it depends on the type). Obviously recommended'

title: 'Chemical mixed soap'
body: 'My skin after taking bath white spot Coming in my hands wrist and between fingers also near outer eyes my sking burning sensation due to chemical mixed soap'

title: 'Not good.'
body: I did not like this product. And the main reason behind this is it's smell. And second is after a few days you will feel bored with this and you will want to purchase a new soap for your bath.

title: 'Fights Germs.'
body: 'Good for skin health but It makes skin dark.'

title: It's have nice fragrance and overall nice.
